title: A Christmas Carol
description: Cruel miser Ebeneezer Scrooge has never met a shilling he doesn't like...and hardly a man he does. And he hates Christmas most of all. When Scrooge is visited by his old partner, Jacob Marley, and the ghosts of Christmas Past, Christmas Present, and Christmas Yet to Come, he learns eternal lessons of charity, kindness, and goodwill. Experience a true Victorian Christmas!This Workman Family Classic edition contains: • Background/Introduction • Biography • Footnotes • a scriptural passage and discussion question after each day’s reading • Extension activities Share the Dickens Christmas Classic with your Family This edition of A Christmas Carol is perfect for families to read together, and has been specially formatted into 24 readings suitable for reading during December. experience one of the greatest Christmas stories of all time all over again!
author: Charles Dickens
